[Isaiah 58:3-8, quoted.] 

     Jesus Christ is our righteousness. Every step that Christ takes and we follow, the glory of the Lord is our rereward. "Then shalt thou call, and the Lord shall answer; thou shalt cry," (now what?) "Here I am. If thou take away from the midst of thee the yoke, the putting forth of the finger, and speaking vanity," then there will be answers to our prayers.
